articles.title: Sentinel-2C joins the Copernicus family in orbit - European Space Agency
articles.description: The third Copernicus Sentinel-2 satellite launched today aboard the final Vega rocket from Europe’s Spaceport in French Guiana. Sentinel-2C will continue providing high-resolution data that is essential to Copernicus – Europe’s world leading Earth observation…
articles.content:
